name: Latangerine Last Journey
description:
My name is Alyce Latangerine. Yes, like a tangerine.
[...]
This story isn’t about my struggles to "survive" in the strange world that is Reality.
This story is not about my autism.
No.
This story is about a journey.
My last journey.

Features

  • A spin-off of "Les 4 Alice : Lorange Journey", 1.000 words
  • With Steam achievements.
  • Dual Language Screen!
